name: FIGHTWORLD
description:
We've finally opened up the amazing experience of the Oasis© to the public!

Enter the Oasis© to control a clone and swing your way to victory in the fantastic Fightworld!

Fightworld is an exclusive arena where you can participate using our patented Oasis© CloneControl-technology. Equip your favourite skill-stick weapon in tons of different gamemodes & customize your clone from top to toe!

And hey, participation is free!

Become the ultimate Fightworld champion!
Are you ready?Gamepad or Controller is strongly recommended when playing this game.
